instructors.name: מר ערן שחם
instructors.description: מנהל בית הספר להייטק וסייבר באוניברסיטת בר-אילן. בעל ניסיון עשיר של למעלה מ-30 שנים כמרצה ומנהל הדרכות בתחום הסייבר ואבטחת המידע. מנהל מרכזי הדרכה מורשים של חברות מובילות בעולם בתחום הווירטואליזציה, תקשורת ואבטחת מידע. יזם, הקים וניהל קורסי תעודה במחשבים ביחידה ללימודי המשך של הטכניון במשך 8 שנים. ניהל את קהילת אבטחת המידע במיקרוסופט ישראל.

instructors.name: מר אריק ווסרמן
instructors.description: מומחה בתחום תשתיות סייבר ו-AI. דוקטורנט בתחום ה-AI באוניברסיטת בר-אילן. פרסם עבודות מחקר בתחום עם השפעה בסייבר ובתחום הבינה המלאכותית.

instructors.name: מר עופר זוין
instructors.description: מומחה בתחום Deep Learning Time Series. בעל תארים מתקדמים בכלכלה, Data Science, ואלגוריתמים מאוניברסיטת בר-אילן, הטכניון, ו-Clark University. מנהל מעבדת פינטק ML & DS באקדמיה ומנהל תחום מדען נתונים בשוק ההון באחד המוסדות הפיננסיים הגדולים. מרצה באוניברסיטת בן גוריון ובמכללות נוספות.

summary: The Certified Data Scientist program at Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security is a comprehensive training course designed to prepare students for careers as skilled data scientists with a specialization in Generative AI. The program emphasizes practical and theoretical knowledge, covering topics such as data integration, statistical analysis, machine learning, and deep learning. Students will gain expertise in tools like Python, Sklearn, Keras, and LangChain, and will learn to develop predictive models, manage data pipelines, and implement AI solutions in production environments. The course includes hands-on projects, personal mentoring, and career development workshops to enhance employability. Graduates will complete a final project showcasing their skills, which can be presented to potential employers. The program is structured over seven months, with classes held twice a week, and offers a prestigious certificate from Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Data Scientist - לימודי תעודה להכשרת מדעני נתונים עם התמחות ב-Generative AI.

COURSE OVERVIEW: This program, offered by Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, prepares students to become skilled data scientists with a specialization in Generative AI. The program focuses on equipping students with the knowledge and tools to develop machine learning projects and implement them in production systems. Graduates will be able to work independently or as part of multidisciplinary teams, and they will complete a final project showcasing their skills.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Not explicitly mentioned.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Program Director: Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. He has over 30 years of experience in cybersecurity and IT training, managing authorized training centers for leading global companies, and developing certificate programs.
- Professional Advisor: Mr. Eric Wasserman, a Ph.D. candidate in AI at Bar-Ilan University, with expertise in cyber infrastructure and AI research.
- Lecturer: Mr. Ofer Zvein, an expert in Deep Learning and Time Series, with academic and industry experience. He holds advanced degrees in Data Science and Economics and manages a fintech lab in academia.

PREREQUISITES: 
- A bachelor's degree or academic background in Information Systems, Industrial Engineering and Management, Computer Science, Economics, or related sciences.
- Admission interview with an academic advisor.

CERTIFICATIONS: Certificate from the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: January 8, 2025.
- Duration: Approximately 7 months.
- Schedule: Sundays and Wednesdays, 17:30–21:30.
- Academic Hours: 275 hours.
- Additional makeup classes may be scheduled outside regular class days.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: Bar-Ilan University campus, Ramat Gan, and online.
- All classes are recorded and available to students during and after the course.
- Advanced multimedia systems in classrooms for interactive learning.
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, depending on university and national guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480₪.
- Tuition Fee: 14,500₪.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- MODULE 1: Introduction to Data Science (10 hours): Overview of data science, research methods, and project anatomy.
- MODULE 2: Databases and SQL Programming (30 hours): SQL basics, advanced SQL programming, and database management.
- MODULE 3: Basic Python Programming (20 hours): Python syntax, data types, functions, and loops.
- MODULE 4: Python for Data Scientists (40 hours): Data manipulation with Pandas, data visualization, and object-oriented programming.
- MODULE 5: Tools for Data Science (5 hours): Version control with Git and GitHub, virtual environments with Poetry.
- MODULE 6: Data Types and Sources (5 hours): Data scales, types, and sources, including relational and non-relational databases.
- MODULE 7: Statistics with Python (25 hours): Statistical methods, probability, and Bayesian analysis.
- MODULE 8: Machine Learning (65 hours): Data preparation, unsupervised and supervised learning, predictive modeling, and hyperparameter tuning.
- MODULE 9: Deep Learning (25 hours): Neural networks, convolutional networks, transfer learning, and recurrent networks.
- MODULE 10: Generative AI (15 hours): Large Language Models, ChatGPT applications, and text-to-image models.
- MODULE 11: Practicum and Final Project (25 hours): Research protocol, data analysis, predictive modeling, and deployment.
- Personal Branding in the Job Market (10 hours): LinkedIn optimization, resume writing, and professional development planning.
